thread.title: Falcons promote Marquand Manuel to defensive coordinator
thread.title_full: Falcons promote Marquand Manuel to defensive coordinator

author: Michael David Smith
title: Falcons promote Marquand Manuel to defensive coordinator
text:
Indybear says: Feb 10, 2017 8:57 AM 
Sources say the clueless owner’s first choice was Buddy Ryan who, even at his present state, has more experience than their newly selected OC. Feb 10, 2017 9:19 AM 
The domino’s are falling. Just like Carolina last season 
Super Bowl Loser (Choker) Curse. Feb 10, 2017 9:57 AM 
Strange I thought they made the Super Bowl this season Feb 10, 2017 10:11 AM 
Didn’t realize the Falcons axed their D Coordinator over that choke fest. Can’t say I blame them, but dang, that’s harsh. atlatlatl says: Feb 10, 2017 10:17 AM 
Atlanta is treating their Super Bowl loss the way many teams treat not making the playoffs at all. I like it. They’ll be back. peyton42 says: Feb 10, 2017 10:58 AM 
Anybody who thinks the Falcons are going to be also-rans next season is just practicing wishful thinking. This team is loaded with young talent entering it’s prime on both sides of the ball. They just need to get meaner on the DL and they could use a FS. This team is set. N JAIL U MY HOE says: Feb 10, 2017 11:07 AM 
Isnt this the same dude that asked if some of the rookies preferred dudes? edelmanfanclub says: Feb 10, 2017 12:21 PM 
Bryant Young is their DL coach? Guy was a beast of a player. Manuel went up the coaching ranks quick. I feel like I was watching him play safety years ago, maybe I just got old quickly. Didnt Marquand ask Eli Apple if he was gay? RegisHawk says: Feb 10, 2017 2:26 PM 
He’s rising quickly…don’t know if he can handle all that. Leave a Reply 
You must be logged in to leave a comment. Not a member? Register now! Search
